enabled.description: True, if user want this configuration to be active.

name.description: Name of the block list from source

source.description: The source URL or the local file path

type.description: Either IP or URL block list type from source

regexType.description: Tells us type of source block-list input as TXT, CSV or custom regex to parse in list

pullingUnit.description: Tells us the interval of fetching whether its Minutes, Hours, Days or Months as a unit

pullingTime.description: The respective value based on the selection of the PullingUnit
